00046 CStyleListPage::CStyleListPage(CPrinter* printer, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00047     : KPrintDialogPage(parent,name), m_printer(printer) {
00048     setTitle(i18n("Styles"));
00049 
00050 //  QFrame *page = addPage( i18n("Layout"), i18n("Layout specific settings") );
00051   QVBoxLayout *topLayout = new QVBoxLayout( this, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00052     
00053   QButtonGroup *group = new QButtonGroup( i18n("Margins (in millimeter)"), this );
00054   QWhatsThis::add(group, WT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER);
00055   topLayout->addWidget( group, 0 );
00056 
00057   QGridLayout *gbox = new QGridLayout( group, 4, 2, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00058   gbox->addRowSpacing( 0, group->fontMetrics().height()-INNER_BORDER );
00059 
00060   const QString name[4] = {i18n("&Top"),i18n("&Bottom"),i18n("&Left"), i18n("&Right") };
00061   for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ) {
00062     m_marginSpin[i] = new QSpinBox( group );
00063     m_marginSpin[i]->setFixedHeight( m_marginSpin[i]->sizeHint().height() );
00064     m_marginSpin[i]->setMinimumWidth( m_marginSpin[i]->fontMetrics().width("M")*10 );
00065     m_marginSpin[i]->setSuffix(" mm");
00066 
00067     QLabel *label = new QLabel( m_marginSpin[i], name[i], group );
00068     label->setFixedHeight( m_marginSpin[i]->sizeHint().height() );
00069     label->setFixedWidth( label->sizeHint().width() );
00070 
00071     if( i < 2 )
00072     {
00073       gbox->addWidget( label, i+1, 0, AlignLeft );
00074       gbox->addWidget( m_marginSpin[i], i+1, 1, AlignLeft );
00075     }
00076     else
00077     {
00078       gbox->addWidget( label, i-1, 3, AlignLeft );
00079       gbox->addWidget( m_marginSpin[i], i-1, 4, AlignLeft );
00080     }
00081   }
00082   QWhatsThis::add(m_marginSpin[0], WT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_TOP);
00083   QWhatsThis::add(m_marginSpin[1], WT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_BOTTOM);
00084   QWhatsThis::add(m_marginSpin[2], WT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_LEFT);
00085   QWhatsThis::add(m_marginSpin[3], WT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_RIGHT);
00086 
00087   QToolTip::add(m_marginSpin[0], TT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_TOP);
00088   QToolTip::add(m_marginSpin[1], TT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_BOTTOM);
00089   QToolTip::add(m_marginSpin[2], TT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_LEFT);
00090   QToolTip::add(m_marginSpin[3], TT_PD_LAYOUT_BORDER_RIGHT);
00091 
00092   gbox->activate(); 
00093   group->setFixedHeight( group->sizeHint().height() );
00094   //set minimum borders
00095   m_marginSpin[0]->setRange(0, 100);    //upper margin
00096   m_marginSpin[1]->setRange(0, 100);    //lower margin
00097   m_marginSpin[2]->setRange(0, 100);    //left margin
00098   m_marginSpin[3]->setRange(0, 100);    //right margin
00099 
00100   QHBoxLayout *entryLayout = new QHBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00101   QVBoxLayout *styleLayout = new QVBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00102   QVBoxLayout *buttonLayout = new QVBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00103     
00104   m_styleList = new CStyleList( m_printer, &(m_printer->styleList()), this, "CStyleList1");
00105     connect(m_styleList, SIGNAL(currentChanged(QListViewItem*)), SLOT(currentStyleChanged(QListViewItem*)));
00106     QToolTip::add(m_styleList, TT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_LIST);    
00107     QWhatsThis::add(m_styleList, WT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_LIST);
00108     
00109   QLabel* label = new QLabel(m_styleList, i18n("List of style items:"), this);
00110   styleLayout->addWidget(label,0);
00111     styleLayout->addWidget( m_styleList, 3);
00112     
00113     m_newStyleButton = new QToolButton( this, "newStyle Button");
00114     m_newStyleButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon(ICON_FILE_NEW));
00115     m_newStyleButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon(ICON_FILE_NEW)); 
00116     QToolTip::add(m_newStyleButton, TT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_NEW);    
00117     QWhatsThis::add(m_newStyleButton, WT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_NEW);  
00118     connect( m_newStyleButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), m_styleList, SLOT(createNewStyle()));
00119         
00120     m_deleteStyleButton = new QToolButton( this, "deleteStyle Button"); 
00121     m_deleteStyleButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon(ICON_FILE_DELETE));
00122     m_deleteStyleButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon(ICON_FILE_DELETE));   
00123     QToolTip::add(m_deleteStyleButton, TT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_DELETE);  
00124     QWhatsThis::add(m_deleteStyleButton, WT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_DELETE);        
00125     connect( m_deleteStyleButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), m_styleList, SLOT(deleteCurrentStyle()));
00126 
00127     m_editStyleButton = new QToolButton( this, "editStyle");
00128     m_editStyleButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon(ICON_EDIT));
00129     m_editStyleButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon(ICON_EDIT));    
00130     QToolTip::add(m_editStyleButton, TT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_EDIT);  
00131     QWhatsThis::add(m_editStyleButton, WT_PD_LAYOUT_STYLE_EDIT);        
00132     connect( m_editStyleButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), m_styleList, SLOT(editCurrentStyle()));
00133         
00134     buttonLayout->addWidget( m_newStyleButton );
00135     buttonLayout->addWidget( m_editStyleButton );
00136     buttonLayout->addWidget( m_deleteStyleButton );
00137     buttonLayout->addStretch(3);
00138         
00139     entryLayout->addLayout( styleLayout );
00140     entryLayout->addLayout( buttonLayout );
00141     
00142     topLayout->addLayout(entryLayout);
00143 
00144 
00145 //  //apply layout settings
00146 
00147 }

00153 void  CStyleListPage::getOptions (QMap<QString, QString>& opts, bool incldef) {
00154     qWarning("CStyleListPage::getOptions (const QMap<QString,QString>& opts, bool)");
00155 
00156     const QString leading = "kde-bibletime-";
00157     opts[ leading+"upper_margin" ] = QString::number(m_marginSpin[0]->value());
00158     qWarning(opts[leading+"upper_margin"].latin1());
00159     opts[ leading+"lower_margin" ] = QString::number(m_marginSpin[1]->value());
00160     opts[ leading+"left_margin"  ] = QString::number(m_marginSpin[2]->value());
00161     opts[ leading+"right_margin" ] = QString::number(m_marginSpin[3]->value());
00162 }
00163 
00164 void  CStyleListPage::setOptions (const QMap<QString,QString>& opts) {
00165     qWarning("CStyleListPage::setOptions (const QMap<QString,QString>& opts)");
00166 
00167     const QString leading = "kde-bibletime-";
00168     QString option = opts[ leading+"upper_margin" ];
00169     m_marginSpin[0]->setValue( option.toInt() );
00170     option = opts[ leading+"lower_margin" ];
00171     m_marginSpin[1]->setValue( option.toInt() );
00172     option = opts[ leading+"left_margin" ];
00173     m_marginSpin[2]->setValue( option.toInt() );
00174     option = opts[ leading+"right_margin" ];
00175     m_marginSpin[3]->setValue( option.toInt() );
00176 }
00177 
00178 bool  CStyleListPage::isValid (QString& errorMessage) {
00179     return true;
00180 }
00181 
00183 void CStyleListPage::currentStyleChanged( QListViewItem* item ){
00184     if (item) {
00185         m_deleteStyleButton->setEnabled( item->text(0) != i18n("Standard") );
00186         m_editStyleButton->setEnabled( true );  
00187     }
00188     else {
00189         m_deleteStyleButton->setEnabled( false );
00190         m_editStyleButton->setEnabled( false ); 
00191     }
00192 }

00198 CPrintItemListPage::CPrintItemListPage(CPrinter* printer, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00199     : KPrintDialogPage(parent,name), m_printer( printer )
00200 {
00201     setTitle(i18n("Print queue"));
00202 
00203   QVBoxLayout *topLayout = new QVBoxLayout( this, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00204   QVBoxLayout *entryLayout = new QVBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00205   QLabel*   label = 0;
00206 
00207   m_styleComboBox = new QComboBox( this, "styleComboBox" );
00208     QToolTip::add(m_styleComboBox, TT_PD_ENTRIES_STYLE_COMBO);
00209     QWhatsThis::add(m_styleComboBox, WT_PD_ENTRIES_STYLE_COMBO);
00210   connect(m_styleComboBox, SIGNAL(activated(const QString&)), SLOT(slotListApplyStyle(const QString&)));
00211 
00212   label = new QLabel( m_styleComboBox, i18n("Choose a style"), this);
00213   QHBoxLayout*  hboxLayout = new QHBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00214   hboxLayout->addWidget( label );
00215   hboxLayout->addWidget( m_styleComboBox );
00216   topLayout->addLayout( hboxLayout );
00217 
00218   hboxLayout = new QHBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00219 
00220   m_printItemList = new CPrintItemList( &(m_printer->printQueue()), this, "CPrintItemList1");
00221     QToolTip::add(m_printItemList, TT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_LIST);
00222     QWhatsThis::add(m_printItemList, WT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_LIST);
00223 
00224   label = new QLabel(m_printItemList, i18n("Entries which should be printed:"), this);
00225   entryLayout->addWidget(label);
00226   entryLayout->addWidget( m_printItemList );
00227   hboxLayout->addLayout(entryLayout);
00228 
00229   QVBoxLayout *buttonLayout = new QVBoxLayout( 0, OUTER_BORDER, INNER_BORDER );
00230   m_moveUpButton = new QToolButton(this);
00231     m_moveUpButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon("up"));
00232     m_moveUpButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon("up"));    
00233     QToolTip::add(m_moveUpButton, TT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_MOVE_UP);
00234     QWhatsThis::add(m_moveUpButton, WT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_MOVE_UP);  
00235     connect(m_moveUpButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),m_printItemList, SLOT(moveUp()));
00236     
00237   m_moveDownButton = new QToolButton(this);
00238     m_moveDownButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon("down"));
00239     m_moveDownButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon("down"));    
00240     QToolTip::add(m_moveDownButton, TT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_MOVE_DOWN);
00241     QWhatsThis::add(m_moveDownButton, WT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_MOVE_DOWN);
00242     connect( m_moveDownButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),m_printItemList, SLOT(moveDown()));
00243     
00244   m_deleteButton = new QToolButton(this);
00245     m_deleteButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon("edittrash"));
00246     m_deleteButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon("edittrash")); 
00247     QToolTip::add(m_deleteButton, TT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_DELETE);
00248     QWhatsThis::add(m_deleteButton, WT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_DELETE);       
00249     connect( m_deleteButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),m_printItemList, SLOT(deleteSelectedItems()));
00250     
00251   m_newPageButton = new QToolButton(this);
00252     m_newPageButton->setOnIconSet( SmallIcon("filenew"));
00253     m_newPageButton->setOffIconSet( SmallIcon("filenew"));  
00254     QToolTip::add(m_newPageButton, TT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_PAGE_BREAK);
00255     QWhatsThis::add(m_newPageButton, WT_PD_ENTRIES_PI_PAGE_BREAK);      
00256     connect( m_newPageButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),m_printItemList, SLOT(newPage()));
00257 
00258   buttonLayout->addWidget(m_moveUpButton);
00259   buttonLayout->addWidget(m_moveDownButton);
00260   buttonLayout->addWidget(m_deleteButton);
00261   buttonLayout->addWidget(m_newPageButton);
00262     buttonLayout->addStretch(3);
00263 
00264   hboxLayout->addLayout( buttonLayout );
00265   topLayout->addLayout( hboxLayout );
00266 
00267     connect(m_printer, SIGNAL(sigStylesChanged()), this, SLOT(stylesChanged()));
00268     stylesChanged(); //fill the box for the first time
00269 }

00286 
00288 void CPrintItemListPage::slotListApplyStyle(const QString& styleName ){
00289     StyleItemList& styleList = m_printer->styleList();  
00290     for(styleList.first(); styleList.current(); styleList.next()) {
00291         if (styleList.current()->styleName() == styleName) {
00292             m_printItemList->applyStyleToSelected( styleList.current() );
00293             break;
00294         }
00295     }
00296 }
00297 
00299 void CPrintItemListPage::stylesChanged(){
00300     m_styleComboBox->clear();
00301     //refill the combobox
00302     StyleItemList& styleList = m_printer->styleList();  
00303     for(styleList.first(); styleList.current(); styleList.next()) {
00304         m_styleComboBox->insertItem(styleList.current()->styleName());
00305     }   
00306 }
